Org: Sheffield Teaching Hospitals NHS Foundation Trust
Real Name: Sheffield Teaching Hospitals NHS Foundation Trust
C2W Scheme: Like 95% of surveyed organisations, a cycle to work scheme is avalible for staff.
Max Value: This organisation has a maximum cycle to work value of £5000.
secure cycle parking: This organisation is one of the 36% of organisations to offer secure bike parking.
The following are provided to help you gain confidence in cycling:
1 to 1 support for route planning: • Support or tools to enable you to find safer routes to work
Ebike Hire/Loan: • The oportunity to loan an ebike to see how that could fit into your life.
Dr Bike / Maintinance Events: Local bike maintinance events such as Dr Bike sessions are run by this organisation to help you keep your bike in good working order.
communal bike maintenance tools: Communal tools are avalible for you to fix those minor cycling breakdowns.
Stated cycling milage scheme: This is one of the 31% of organisations that does not pay milage to cyclists, ignoring the HMRC guidelines
